Product Title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! - Seasons 1 - 4 [DVD]
Review Date: 2020/06/02
Store: Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Action & Adventure
Product Description: ['Trolls: The Beat Goes On! is an all-new chapter in the hair-raising adventures of DreamWorks Trolls, as Poppy, Branch and all of Troll Village keep the dance party raving in their fantastical forest home. Picking up where the blockbuster film left off, the Trolls are settling into a new era with Poppy as Queen. Bursting with their signature positivity, irreverence and a whole lotta original music, Trolls: The Beat Goes On! opens up the colorful world of Trolls for new adventures and a dance party around every corner.']
Average Rating: 4.7

Thomas & Friends: Blue Mountain Mystery the Movie
Michael Brandon  (Actor),     David Bedella  (Actor),     Greg Tiernan  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Kids & Family
['Product Description', "When trouble strikes at the Blue Mountain Quarry, Thomas is sent to help his Narrow Gauge engine friends. While shunting and hauling, he discovers a little green engine hiding in the tunnels. Thomas is determined to get to the bottom of the mystery but discovering the truth is harder than he imagined! Will Thomas be able to help his new friend? Or will the little engine be sent away from Sodor forever? Find out in Thomas' most mysterious adventure yet, a movie the whole family will love!", 'Bonus Content:', 'Blue Mountain Hide & Peep Game', 'Blue Mountain Hide & Peep Game', 'Learn About Standard & Narrow Guage Engines', 'Learn About Standard & Narrow Guage Engines', '"Blue Mountain Mystery" Karaoke Music Video', '"Blue Mountain Mystery" Karaoke Music Video', '"Working Together!" Karaoke Music Video', '"Working Together!" Karaoke Music Video', ']]>', 'Amazon.com', 'Thomas the tank engine and his railway friends learn all about how rumors spread and the importance of getting all the facts before leaping to judgment in', 'Blue Mountain Mystery', '. When Sir Topham Hatt sends Thomas off to help the narrow-gauge engines at Blue Mountain Quarry after Paxton is injured by an unstable bridge, Thomas discovers a little green engine hiding in the tunnels. Some sleuthing reveals that green engine Luke is hiding because he once did something very bad; but what that something is remains a mystery. Thomas decides to find out exactly what happened, but his detective work yields some unintended consequences that just might get Luke thrown off of Sodor Island. This', 'Thomas & Friends', 'movie acquaints young viewers with the concept of standard and narrow-gauge tracks and engines and introduces new friends Owen the traction engine, who pulls heavy loads up the quarry incline; little green engine Luke; Merrick the sleepy crane; and track car Winston, who makes odd sounds and has a long way to go before becoming a really useful member of the railway. (Ages 2 to 6)', '--Tami Horiuchi']

["Adventure and learning await in these heart-warming tales based on the award-winning book series by author and illustrator Anna Dewdney. Join Llama Llama, Nelly Gnu, Luna Giraffe, Euclid the Sheep and Gilroy Goat as they explore their safe, friendly hometown and make childhood memories. On this DVD, watch Llama Llama at his first sleepover with friends! Learn how to share on a play date with Nelly Gnu! Discover what makes Llama Llama's red pajamas so lucky and so much more!  Learn and play with Llama Llama and pals!"]

Christmas On The Range
Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Romance
["All Kendall Riley wants for the holidays is to save her family's ranch, but her longtime rival, small-town scrooge Brick McCree, has other plans in mind. When Brick's son, Clint, comes back to town, he is immediately drawn to Kendall and offers a helping hand. As a romance starts to blossom, Kendall's farm is sabotaged, leaving her to wonder about Clint's true intentions. Filled with action, adventure, redemption, and forgiveness, this is a modern-day Christmas story, that the entire family will love. Starring Erin Cahill (Saving Grace, Last Vermont Christmas), Nicholas Gonzalez (The Good Doctor, How to Get Away with Murder), A Martinez (Longmire, Santa Barbara), and Lindsay Wagner (The Bionic Woman, Grey's Anatomy)."]

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests:** Passionate about family-friendly animated content with nostalgic themes and wholesome holiday films that resonate with both children and adults. 
- **Target Audience:** Strong inclination toward media designed for young audiences, fostering family bonding during festive gatherings and shared experiences.
- **Purchasing Behavior:** Actively looks for deals on high-quality media, emphasizing well-reviewed products to ensure enjoyable viewing experiences. The latest purchase reflects a commitment to selecting captivating family films that promote positive narratives and create joyful connections.
- **Content Preference:** Prefers films and shows that appeal to both children and adults, focusing on quality content that fosters joy and lasting memories. There is an openness to charming romantic storylines that can enhance family-friendly entertainment.
- **Format Preference:** Welcomes various formats that enhance viewing experiences, with a notable appreciation for high-quality audio-visual elements and bonus features that enrich family movie nights.
- **Engagement Style:** Demonstrates enthusiasm through positive ratings and reviews, eager for media that nurtures joyful connections. Recent interactions show a readiness to embrace diverse genres, provided they uphold a family-friendly focus.

This user remains dedicated to enriching family experiences with quality content while being mindful of value-driven purchasing, enhancing the overall joy of shared entertainment moments.
